title: Channel24.co.za | The Drakensberg Boys Choir sing for their supper on Ultimate Braai Master
text:
The Drakensberg Boys Choir sing for their supper on Ultimate Braai Master 2015-10-23 16:00 The Drakensberg Boys Choir! (Ultimate Braai Master) Related Links 
Cape Town – On Ultimate Braai Master this week the ten remaining teams travel inland from the coast of Rocky Bay in Kwazulu Natal to the rolling green hills of the Drakensberg Mountains. 
It becomes clearer that no one is going to be able to guess the game, and the crews are slightly on edge. 
Emotions run high as two teams who have become firm friends have to go up against each other in a gruelling elimination challenge where they have to braai gourmet boerie rolls and burgers for a young group of very special guests, who have to sing for their supper – The Drakensberg Boys Choir! 
While one team's dreams of being this year's Ultimate Braai Master go up in smoke, the game must go on, and three teams go head-to-head in a five hour crew challenge that's all about hearty winter food, timing and flavour. 
While they sweat over hot fires, the remaining teams have their own battle - a soccer match against the Didima Vultures! 
Meanwhile during the challenge, one team's lack of culinary know-how and fireside skills lands their entire crew in an elimination challenge. 
Watch a teaser here: 
The article is sponsored by Ultimate Braai Master .
